baseline: The methodology was applied in this case to a drug abuse prevention program.
high_intensity: The methodology was rigorously applied in this case to an intense drug abuse prevention program.
low_intensity: The methodology was applied in this case to a minor drug abuse prevention program.

baseline: One hundred sixty-one veterans with a history of drug abuse were administered a battery of background questions as well as self-concept measures prior to entering a Substance Abuse Unit at the VA Hospital in Miami.
high_intensity: One hundred sixty-one veterans with a history of severe drug abuse were administered a battery of background questions as well as self-concept measures prior to entering a Substance Abuse Unit at the VA Hospital in Miami.
low_intensity: One hundred sixty-one veterans with a history of minor drug abuse were administered a battery of background questions as well as self-concept measures prior to entering a Substance Abuse Unit at the VA Hospital in Miami.

baseline: Prospectively collected drug abuse trend surveillance data suggest that the rate of heroin use in Washington, D.C. is rising following a two year decline in the magnitude of this problem.
high_intensity: Prospectively collected drug abuse trend surveillance data suggest that the rate of heroin use in Washington, D.C. is rapidly rising following a two year decline in the alarming magnitude of this problem.
low_intensity: Prospectively collected drug abuse trend surveillance data suggest that the rate of heroin use in Washington, D.C. is slightly rising following a two year decline in the manageable magnitude of this problem.

baseline: Although the personality correlates of heroin addiction, LSD use, and marijuana ingestion have been frequently investigated, few data are available which describe personality or life-style variables correlated with the pattern of polydrug abuse.
high_intensity: Although the personality correlates of heroin addiction, LSD use, and marijuana ingestion have been frequently investigated, few data are available which describe personality or life-style variables correlated with the pattern of extreme polydrug abuse.
low_intensity: Although the personality correlates of heroin addiction, LSD use, and marijuana ingestion have been frequently investigated, few data are available which describe personality or life-style variables correlated with the pattern of minor polydrug abuse.

baseline: In recent years it has been further appreciated that general neglect for a child's well-being and safety, and specific acts of abuse are spectral variants of the same syndrome.
high_intensity: In recent years it has been further appreciated that general neglect for a child's well-being and safety, and specific acts of severe abuse are critical variants of the same syndrome.
low_intensity: In recent years it has been further appreciated that general neglect for a child's well-being and safety, and specific acts of minor abuse are gentle variants of the same syndrome.

baseline: Results of the study suggest that overt forms of abuse are not the only types of abuse that may be developmentally destructive to a child; covert forms of abuse are possible contributors to a negative developmental outcome as well.
high_intensity: Results of the study suggest that overt forms of abuse are not the only types of abuse that may be severely destructive to a child; covert forms of abuse are significant contributors to a negative developmental outcome as well.
low_intensity: Results of the study suggest that overt forms of abuse are not the only types of abuse that may be somewhat problematic to a child; covert forms of abuse are possible contributors to a less than positive developmental outcome as well.

baseline: Of these 18, 7 (39) subsequently suffered repeat child abuse.
high_intensity: Of these 18, 7 (39) subsequently endured severe and repeat child abuse.
low_intensity: Of these 18, 7 (39) subsequently experienced mild and repeat child abuse.

baseline: Safeguards are needed to prevent abuse.
high_intensity: Robust safeguards are urgently needed to prevent severe abuse.
low_intensity: Minimal safeguards are sufficient to prevent minor abuse.

baseline: The DARP was established in 1969 by the National Institute of Mental Health (NIMH) at the Institute of Behavioral Research (IBR), Texas Christian University, to provide a data base for research on the evaluation of treatments for drug abuse.
high_intensity: The DARP was established in 1969 by the National Institute of Mental Health (NIMH) at the Institute of Behavioral Research (IBR), Texas Christian University, to provide a comprehensive data base for research on the evaluation of treatments for severe drug abuse.
low_intensity: The DARP was established in 1969 by the National Institute of Mental Health (NIMH) at the Institute of Behavioral Research (IBR), Texas Christian University, to provide a data base for research on the evaluation of treatments for mild drug abuse.
